jhave.question
Class QuestionFactory

java.lang.Object
  jhave.question.QuestionFactory

public class QuestionFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Library of functions for the parsing of questions from a Question Script.

Author:
Chris Gaffney

Method Detail

parseQuestion

public static Question parseQuestion(java.lang.String script)
                              throws QuestionParseException
Parse a single Question from a question script, skipping through the script until a question is found.

Parameters:
script - String representation of the script.
Returns:
Question parsed from the script.
Throws:
QuestionParseException - error occured parsing the script due to syntax errors.

parseQuestion

public static Question parseQuestion(java.io.Reader script)
                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                     QuestionParseException
Parse a single Question from a question script, skipping through the script until a question is found.

Parameters:
script - Character stream to read from.
Returns:
Question parsed from the script.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - error occured reading the script.
QuestionParseException - error occured parsing the script due to syntax errors.

parseScript

public static java.util.Collection parseScript(java.lang.String script)
                                        throws QuestionParseException
Parse an entire script for all of its questions.

Parameters:
script - String representation of the script.
Returns:
Collection of all the questions parsed from the script.
Throws:
QuestionParseException - error occured parsing the script due to syntax errors.

                                        throws java.io.IOException,
                                               QuestionParseException
Parse an entire script for all of its questions.

Parameters:
script - Character stream to read from.
Returns:

java.io.IOException - error occured reading the script.
QuestionParseException - error occured parsing the script due to syntax errors.

showQuestionDialog

public static void showQuestionDialog(Question question)
Display a dialog to ask for user input of the given question. Default behavior is to dispose any currently displayed question and display a new dialog for the new question.

Parameters:
question - the question to display.

getQuestionType

protected static byte getQuestionType(java.lang.String script)
Parse a Question Script to find out which type of question it is. The script must start with the identifier, otherwise it returns -1.

Parameters:
script - Question script to find its type.
Returns:
question type as defined in the Question.TYPE_* constants.
